item.title: 'Archaic' text based email clients rock!
item.description: Table of Contents TLDR - for the busy folks Goals: Summary: Multiple email accounts. Lack of a unified interface. Creating sync channels via mbsync Text based email client! Speed + simplicity Why mu4e rocks [for me] - the perks Quirks Multiple levels of filters are still necessary. Takeaways Links and References This dev.to blog post inspired me to complete this languishing draft of my current email setup, and the benefits I’ve gained from using a text based email client in Emacs.
